sentences.en: He filed an undefended suit against the Columbia Record Company.

sentences.en: Gayatu Chakravarti Spivak is a respected literary critic and professor at Columbia University.

sentences.en: In spite of his advancing years, he twice attempted a long swim in the Columbia River.

sentences.en: Others, including New York University and Columbia University, have given similar reassurances.

sentences.en: Shuttle Columbia, one of five spaceships, made the first flight of the program in April, 1981.

sentences.en: You have brought us honor in acquiring a Ph. D. from Columbia University.

sentences.en: Columbia University researchers found similar findings in a study they conducted in 2015.

sentences.en: Others, including New York University and Columbia University, have given similar reassurances.
